Header: Kanjipani Imran to be produced in Courts on the 09th of this month
Content: Colombo Chief Magistrate Lanka Jayaratne has ordered the Boossa Prison Superintendent to produce Kanjipani Imran in Courts on the 09th of this month. Orders were given to produce this suspect in this manner following an incident related to berating the OIC of the Central Anti-Corruption Unit affiliated to the Keselwatte Police.
